DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether markers on tumor tissue may be an indicator for good response to neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy in patients with rectal cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Expression of Molecular Markers Before and After Neo-adjuvant Chemoradiotherapy in Rectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: locally advanced rectal cancer uT3 or uT4 no distant metastasis neoadjuvant radiochemotherapy required rejection of radiochemotherapy
